attributes.additional_details: I want them to unban electric scooter as it is safer than getting busses and trains and also it is good for the environment .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Legalize Personal Light Electric vehicles (PLEVs) such as e-scooters, EUC, etc.: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332067

Legalise and regulate the use of privately owned eScooters before Spring 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553756
